job.title: Software Engineer (Backend)
job.description: We are looking for brilliant software engineers who have a passion for consumer products and want to join an energetic team that is changing the way people think about travel We ship code daily AB test extensively and have a primary role in creating the product from inception to implementation Theres much to do and youll be responsible for making some real cool stuff happenbrbrOur APIs internal services and web app are at the core of our stable of software thats reinventing mobility Be a member of a small team of talented engineers and designers and play a major role in shaping an exciting app thats changing how people travel and think about car ownershipbrbrstrongLearn more about our Engineering team here strongstronghttpswwwbeforeyouapplycomteamengineeringatturobrbrstrongstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliYou will collaborate extensively with product management design and engineers to develop product features that drive our metricsliliYou will produce highquality maintainable code test it collaboratively review it and ship itliliYou will identify areas to improve and scale our architecture and application designliliYou will develop tools and utilities to diagnose and fix problemsliliEnsure proper technical design and documentationliliWork efficiently in a constantly changing and growing environment where the process is fluid and creative solutions are desiredbrliulstrongYour ProfilebrstrongulliBachelorsMasters degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related fieldliliTypically a minimum of 2 years experience shipping highscale code to productionliliFluent in at least one language  eg Java Python Ruby Go or CliliPossess strong computer science fundamentals data structures algorithms database concepts distributed systems and searchliliStrong communicator Explaining technical concepts and challenges to other engineers is no problem for youliliEnjoy solving problems and helping others meet their goalsliliPassionate about learning the ins and outs of a variety of backend technologiesbrliulstronguBenefitsbrustrongulliCompetitive salary and equity for all fulltime employeesliliEmployerpaid medical dental vision insurance and 401k matchliliFlexible paid time off 11 paid holidays paid volunteer time off and paid parental leaveliliTuro host matching and vehicle reimbursement programliliMonthly Fringe benefits stipendliliMonthly Turo travel creditbrliulstronguAbout TurobrbrustrongTuro is the worlds largest car sharing marketplace where you can book any car you want wherever you want it from a vibrant community of trusted hosts across the US Canada and the UK Guests choose from a totally unique selection of nearby cars while hosts earn extra money to offset the costs of car ownership A pioneer of the sharing economy and the travel industry Turo is a safe supportive community where the car you book is part of a story not a fleet Discover Turo at httpsturocom the App Store and Google Play and check out our blog Field NotesbrbrTuro has raised 450M to date from toptier investors including IAC Daimler AG Kleiner Perkins GV Canaan Partners August Capital and Shasta VenturesbrbrTuro cultivates a tightknit team of smart critical thinkers who care about their work and their colleagues Our recruiting team is always on the lookout for supportive downtoearth pioneering and efficient candidates to grow our teams talent and enrich our culturebrbrRead more about the Turo culture according to Turo CEO Andre HaddadbrbrWere an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We dont discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status When in doubt please applybrbr
